GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an article by its id number

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new user comment to an article

exampleResponse.body: I am 100% sure that we're not completely sure.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id
